name: strtok3

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.clean: del-cli lib/** src/**/*.js src/**/*.js.map src/**/*.d.ts test/**/*.js test/**/*.js.map
scripts.compile: npm run compile-src && npm run compile-test
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover-test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.lint: npm run lint-md && npm run lint-ts
scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run cover-test
